text: The 2014–15 FC Lorient season is the 89th professional season of the club since its creation in 1926. ==Players== ===First team squad=== French teams are limited to four players without EU citizenship. Hence, the squad list includes only the principal nationality of each player; several non-European players on the squad have dual citizenship with an EU country. Also, players from the ACP countries—countries in Africa, the Caribbean, and the Pacific that are signatories to the Cotonou Agreement—are not counted against non-EU quotas due to the Kolpak ruling. ==Competitions== ===Ligue 1=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by match==== ====Matches==== ===Coupe de la Ligue=== ===Coupe de France=== ==References== 2014-15 Lorient
title: 2014–15 FC Lorient season
